metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Uses catchy songs and relatable situations to teach emotional intelligence and social skills, similar to Bluey's focus on emotional development.

metas.name: The Magic School Bus Rides Again
metas.description: An updated version of the classic, this show combines science education with fun adventures, appealing to kids who enjoy learning through animation like in Curious George.

metas.name: Molly of Denali
metas.description: Features a resourceful Alaskan Native girl who uses informational texts to solve problems and learn about her culture, promoting problem-solving skills like Curious George.

metas.name: Doc McStuffins
metas.description: Aimed at preschoolers, Doc McStuffins promotes caring for others and basic health concepts through imaginative play, similar to the positive and gentle themes found in Bluey.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: A stop-motion animated series that encourages preschoolers to explore science through play and imagination, promoting curiosity and observation skills like Curious George.
